data.name: sqlVesselDCPRules
data.value:
select * from ( SELECT ola.ola_description, cvc.cvc_carriervesselid, ola.ola_sourcecomputer, ola.ser_serviceid, ola.ola_priority, ola.cat_carrierid, ola.com_companyid, ola.ola_computerrule, ola.ola_onlineaccessrightid, ola.ola_onlineaccessrightid ola_olaid, ola.usg_usergroupid, ola.ves_vesselid, cvc.cvc_rowstatus, (select min(d.old_destination) from ds_oladestination d where d.ola_onlineaccessrightid = ola.ola_onlineaccessrightid) old_destination FROM ds_onlineaccessright ola, ds_carriervesselconf cvc, ds_duacoretunnel dct where ola.cvc_carriervesselid = cvc.cvc_carriervesselid and cvc.cvc_carriervesselid = dct.cvc_carriervesselid and ola.cvc_carriervesselid is not null and dct.dct_rowstatus in (0,1) and cvc.cvc_rowstatus in (0,1) and ves_vesselid = :vesselid
union
select ola.ola_description, ola.cvc_carriervesselid, ola.ola_sourcecomputer, ola.ser_serviceid, ola.ola_priority, ola.cat_carrierid, ola.com_companyid, ola.ola_computerrule, ola.ola_onlineaccessrightid, ola.ola_onlineaccessrightid ola_olaid, ola.usg_usergroupid, ola.ves_vesselid, 0 cvc_rowstatus, (select min(d.old_destination) from ds_oladestination d where d.ola_onlineaccessrightid = ola.ola_onlineaccessrightid) old_destination from ds_onlineaccessright ola where ves_vesselid = :vesselid and com_companyid = :companyid and cat_carrierid is null and cvc_carriervesselid is null
union
select distinct ola.ola_description, cvc.cvc_carriervesselid, ola.ola_sourcecomputer, ola.ser_serviceid, ola.ola_priority, ola.cat_carrierid, ola.com_companyid, ola.ola_computerrule, (-rownum) ola_onlineaccessrightid, ola.ola_onlineaccessrightid ola_olaid, ola.usg_usergroupid, ola.ves_vesselid, cvc.cvc_rowstatus, (select min(d.old_destination) from ds_oladestination d where d.ola_onlineaccessrightid = ola.ola_onlineaccessrightid) old_destination from ds_onlineaccessright ola, ds_vesselequipment veq, ds_carriervesselconf cvc, ds_duacoretunnel dct where veq.veq_vesselequipmentid = cvc.veq_vesselequipmentid and ola.cat_carrierid = veq.cat_carrierid and cvc.cvc_carriervesselid = dct.cvc_carriervesselid and dct.dct_rowstatus in (0,1) and veq.veq_rowstatus in (0,1) and cvc.cvc_rowstatus in (0,1) and ola.cat_carrierid is not null and ola.com_companyid = :companyid and veq.ves_vesselid = :vesselid
union
select ola.ola_description, ola.cvc_carriervesselid, ola.ola_sourcecomputer, ola.ser_serviceid, ola.ola_priority, ola.cat_carrierid, ola.com_companyid, ola.ola_computerrule, ola.ola_onlineaccessrightid, ola.ola_onlineaccessrightid ola_olaid, ola.usg_usergroupid, ola.ves_vesselid, 0 cvc_rowstatus, (select min(d.old_destination) from ds_oladestination d where d.ola_onlineaccessrightid = ola.ola_onlineaccessrightid) old_destination from ds_onlineaccessright ola where cat_carrierid is null and com_companyid = :companyid and ves_vesselid is null ) ORDER BY decode(cvc_carriervesselid, null, 0,1) desc, decode(ola_sourcecomputer, null, 0, 1) desc, decode(usg_usergroupid, null, 0, 1) desc, decode(ser_serviceid, null, 0, 1) desc, decode(old_destination, null, 0, 1) desc
